Title: Relates to electric generating facility annual reports; and to repeal section 575-b of the real property tax law relating to solar or wind energy) systems
Summary: Eliminates the necessity for solar and wind energy systems to supply certain information in electric generating facility annual reports; repeals provisions relating to solar or wind energy systems.
LawCode: Rpld ยง575-b, amd ยง575-a, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to electric generating facility annual reports; and to repeal section 575-b of such law relating to solar or wind energy systems
